show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com interviews author of A Manual for MODERN MYSTIC,  and professional... <!--more--> astrologer Rio Olesky.
Rio received a Bachelor’s Degree in humanities from the University of California at Berkeley and a Master’s Degree in humanities from San Francisco State University.
He has been a serious student of astrology since 1967 and a professional astrologer since 1976.
Rio also writes monthly columns for local and national publications.
He gives lectures and has been on radio and television talk shows, and teaches classes in astrology since the mid-70’s.
Although his primary focus is spiritual (he has been a practitioner of Kriya Yoga since 1975), Rio also brings to his readings the experience of being a husband, father and grandfather.
He is also an accomplished didgeridoo player.
 www.starwatcher.com
